1453580.name: Ambient Channels: Phreakers - Black Room
1453580.description:
In the 'Phreakers' series, we provide a fantasy juxtaposition of 90's rave culture, industrial music and telco hacking. In Black Room, you'll find a hacker's room, currently shutdown in security mode.

This isn't cyberpunk.

*This episode is currently ambiance only and does not include a hidden objects game. It does include a short secret items game.*

This episode is part of the Ambient Channels: Collector's Pass 2020/2021
1453580.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
